heading: HR01201
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEES ON AQUACULTURE AND FISHERIES RESOURCES, NATURAL RESOURCES AND POVERTY ALLEVIATION TO CONDUCT A JOINT INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE SOCIO-ECONOMIC AND ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACT OF RECLAMATION PROJECTS UNDER THE NATIONAL RECLAMATION PROGRAM (NRP) OR SIMILAR PROGRAM OF THE PRESENT ADMINISTRATION, AS PROMOTED BY THE PHILIPPINE RECLAMATION AUTHORITY (PRA), DUE TO THE BROAD CLAMOR OF AFFECTED SECTORS, PRIMARILY THE FISHERFOLK SECTOR

FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEES ON AQUACULTURE AND FISHERIES RESOURCES, NATURAL RESOURCES AND POVERTY ALLEVIATION TO CONDUCT A JOINT INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE SOCIO-ECONOMIC AND ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACT OF RECLAMATION PROJECTS UNDER THE NATIONAL RECLAMATION PROGRAM (NRP) OR SIMILAR PROGRAM OF THE PRESENT ADMINISTRATION, AS PROMOTED BY THE PHILIPPINE RECLAMATION AUTHORITY (PRA), DUE TO THE BROAD CLAMOR OF AFFECTED SECTORS, PRIMARILY THE FISHERFOLK SECTOR
